profile_summary:

I have a proven track record in enterprise software sales, pre-sales engineering, and C-level engagement, effectively communicating technical discoveries and crafting compelling proof of concepts. My technical acumen is complemented by hands-on experience with **Azure** and **AWS**, and expertise in utilizing tools such as **Minitab Statistical Software** and **Minitab Connect** for advanced analytics solutions. 
In my previous roles, I successfully developed high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors using a comprehensive tech stack that includes **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Furthermore, I am adept at leading enterprise-grade platforms that harness AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing, while ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
